extra_business_days.description: The extra business days of the calendar. These days are business day weekends. Must be empty if `treat_weekend_as_business_day` is `true`.

extra_holidays.description: The extra holidays of the calendar. These days are non-business day weekdays if `treat_weekend_as_business_day` is `false`.

holiday_weekdays.description: Weekdays treated as holidays as default. Typically, Saturday and Sunday.

valid_from.description: The valid period of the calendar. include `valid_from`.

valid_to.description: The valid period of the calendar. exclude `valid_to`.
